name: MosPho - Photo Mosaic Musings
body:
## MosPho
Basic image mosaic creator. Also Phil Karlton apparently once said
>There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things

Hence the poor name choice. The 's' wasnt there in the original title. 

### Implementation 
Bare bones. As much background processing as possible. No Picasso/Fresco/Retrofit and other things. No real OOP. Does the job for an MVP though and I'd be happy to ship and measure progress before building a beast. If there's no network, I pick up average chunk colours and display the mosaic.

### Logic
Very Simple. 
* FETCH IMAGE FROM WHEREVER THE USER WANTS TO
* SPLIT IMAGE INTO SMALLER PIECES
* RUN EACH ROW THROUGH THE NETWORK TO FIND THE EQUIVALENT IMAGE
* STITCH THE IMAGE BACK
* DISPLAY MOSAIC AND VOILA, WE'RE DONE.

### MinSDK
KitKat - API 19. Reason is that still a large % of users are on kitkat and although tempting to set minSDK to Lollipop (and get all the Palette class goodness) this is better for bare bones coding and manipulation.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Email me at vrashabh86@gmail.com and I will help you set this up
